question:
[Joseph] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Michele]. [Dana] and her son, [Larry], went to the park to fly a kite. They had fun doing it all day. [Gordon] and his son [Larry] went to look at cars. [Gordon] ended up buying the Mustang. [Judy] went to her brother [William]'s birthday party [Joseph] and his brother [William] went to the mall. [Joseph]'s son, [Lawrence], went with them. [Lawrence]'s brother, [Freddie], could n't come because he was busy with his homework. [Dana] was eager to spend time with her son, [Joseph]. [Michele] attended the graduation of her sister's son [Freddie].
Question: How is [Gordon] related to [Judy]?
